metadata.description: The base URL of the Azure Resource Manager template repository raw files.
The Outbound IP address of the corporate network gateway.
The base URL of the current project repository raw files.
The custom fully qualified domain name for this moodle instance.
The password to use in order to manage the database server.
The username to use in order to manage the database server.
The database backup retention period in days.
The number of vCPUs allocated to the database.
The Moodle application database account password.
The Moodle application database account username.
The size of data storage allocated to the database in MB.
The size of the Moodle Data Disk in giga bytes.
A comma separated list of source IP addresses (in CIDR notation) that must NOT access to the solution.

The deployment timestamp. Determines whether the Virtual Machine Custom Script extension is rerun. Default value will have the Virtual Machine Custom Script extension rerun at each ARM template deployment. Ref.: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/virtual-machines/extensions/custom-script-linux#property-value-details
The name of the provisioned environment. Used to build resource names.
The URI of the SSL Certificate Secret used by the Application Gateway.
The User Identity assigned to the Application Gateway to get the SSL Certificate Secret.
The base URL of the Generic Shell Scripts repository raw files.
The name of the Azure Location where resources will be created.
The data retention period for the Log Analytics Workspace resource.
The email address of the Moodle Administrator.
The password the Moodle Administrator account.
The username of the Moodle Administrator account.
The Moodle upgrade key.

The short name of the project. This string will be used to name all resources required. It must only contain letters (a-z,A-Z), hyphens (-) and underscore (_) characters, and must not exceed 13 characters in lenght.
Additional tags to add to each resource created.
The fully qualified domain name of the email server to use.
The FROM address for every email sent by the solution.
The SMTP server account password.
The SMTP server port.
The SMTP server account username.
Optional tags specific to Virtual Machines.
The virtual network IP address prefix. Format is '255.255.255'.
The Web server administrator's email address.
The Web server administrator's password.
The Web server administrator's username.
The Web server automatic reboot time in UTC. Format: 'HH:MM'

properties.value: Timestamp: %t | Username: %u | Database: %d | Client IP: %r | Session ID: %c

protectedSettings.commandToExecute: [concat('sudo ./setup_web_server', ' --data_disk_size ', parameters('dataDiskSizeGB'), 'G', ' --db_server_admin_password ', parameters('databaseAdminPassword'), ' --db_server_admin_username ', parameters('databaseAdminUsername'), ' --db_server_fqdn ', reference(variables('databaseName')).fullyQualifiedDomainName, ' --db_server_name ', variables('databaseName'), ' --moodle_admin_email ', parameters('moodleAdminEmail'), ' --moodle_admin_password ', parameters('moodleAdminPassword'), ' --moodle_admin_username ', parameters('moodleAdminUsername'), ' --moodle_data_mount_point_path ', variables('moodleDataMountPointPath'), ' --moodle_db_name ', variables('databaseApplicationDatabaseName'), ' --moodle_db_password ', parameters('databaseMoodlePassword'), ' --moodle_db_username ', parameters('databaseMoodleUsername'), ' --moodle_upgrade_key ', parameters('moodleUpgradeKey'), ' --proxy_ip_address_range ', variables('gatewaySubnetAddressPrefix'), ' --smtp_server_fqdn ', parameters('smtpServerFqdn'), ' --smtp_server_from_address ', parameters('smtpServerFromAddress'), ' --smtp_server_password ', parameters('smtpServerPassword'), ' --smtp_server_port ', parameters('smtpServerPort'), ' --smtp_server_username ', parameters('smtpServerUsername'), ' --web_server_admin_email ', parameters('webServerAdminEmail'), ' --web_server_fqdn ', if(empty(parameters('customApplicationFqdn')), reference(variables('gatewayPublicIpName')).dnsSettings.fqdn, parameters('customApplicationFqdn')), ' --web_server_reboot_utc_time ', parameters('webServerRebootUtcTime'), ' --web_server_resource_name ', variables('webServerVirtualMachineName'), ' > /var/log/setup_web_server.$(date +"%Y%m%dT%H%M%S").log 2>&1')]

resources.name: [variables('diagnosticStorageAccountName')]
resources.comments: Storage Account firewall must be turned off for Guest Metrics to work as per the following reference: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-ca/azure/azure-monitor/platform/metrics-troubleshoot#cannot-pick-guest-os-namespace-and-metrics

resources.name: [concat(variables('webServerVirtualMachineName'), '/', variables('webServerVirtualMachineLinuxDiagnosticExtensionName'))]
resources.comments: Metrics collected by the Linux Diagnostic Extension, sent to an Azure Storage Account and kept for 14 days as per https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/platform/data-platform-metrics#retention-of-metrics.
